name: The Big, Friendly Thud!
summary: BF_THUD!, which stands for The Big, Friendly THUD!, is a 1995 megawad for Doom II. It was designed by Christen Klie, and includes half a dozen levels from his earlier ChrisK, which was itself based on his earlier Chris_E1, and which were also re-used in The Lost Episodes of Doom.
